title: How Kassadin escaped the champion graveyard
body:
Link to the previous thread
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/F63ApRZq-how-i-imagine-kassadin-must-feel-about-being-nerfed

As most of you know Kassadin just received massive buffs on the PBE that made him more mobile than Rammus with {{item:3270}} (Okay, maybe a bit of an exaggeration)  so here's a follow up to explain how he escaped

{{champion:78}} :ROYAL FLUSH BABY!

{{champion:2}}  :Guys? Where did this blue midget come from? Are you even a champion?

{{champion:78}} :Guys I'm Poppy, I've been here since forever...

{{champion:6}} :I don't know what a "Poppy" is but it sounds dissapointing

{{champion:78}} : ;w;

*meanwhile*

{{champion:38}} *Riftwalk* *Riftwalk* *Riftwalk* GAH! WHY CANT I LEAVE!

{{champion:45}} :Ummm, what is this place?

{{champion:38}} :*Riftwalk* DAMMIT *Riftwalk* DAMMIT *Riftwalk* DAMMIT

{{champion:28}} :I told you, that wall is made of solid plot-deviceium, even if you could go halfway through you cant leave

{{champion:82}} :Hey Veigar, this is the place where blah blah champions die blah blah nerf, you get the idea

{{champion:45}} :Hey... that blue girl looks familiar...

{{champion:78}} : ! You remember me!?

{{champion:45}} :Aren't you Tristana? Why are you carrying that hammer?

{{champion:78}} : ... *I swear to god I will kill you all one day*

{{champion:60}} Hmmmm if I did this then... 

*Suddenly, the ground shakes. An earth-shattering roar is heard from the outside world*

{{champion:38}} :THE VOID! IT APPROACHES

{{champion:60}} :Kassadin! I know how you can escape! 

{{champion:38}} :QUICK! VALORAN NEEDS ME!

{{champion:60}} :If we all gather our remaining strength we can Kassadin absorb it and he might get strong enough to escape! EVERYONE RAISE YOUR HANDS TO THE SIDE

{{champion:2}} :Why the side?

{{champion:60}} :So we don't get sued for plagiarism, duh.

*All the champions barring Kassadin gather their remaining energy and form a giant ball of strength, stronger than even the greatest nerfs"*

*As Kassadin absorbed the ~~Genki Dama~~ sphere of power some of it splashed on Veigar*

{{champion:28}} :Kassadin! Before you leave, please give this letter to Twisted Fate. Tell him that one day we will cross paths again

{{champion:38}} :You still have feelings for him?

{{champion:28}} :lol no, but he's great at &%$*%*$

{{champion:38}} :ewww...

*Kassadin approches the Wall*

{{champion:38}} :699 units of plot-deviceium huh? No sweat. *Riftwalks*

{{champion:28}} :Damn, his butt was nice.

{{champion:6}} : .-. wow


*As Kassadin Riftwalked through he lost much of his newfound strength, but nonetheless he emerged stronger than before*

{{champion:90}} TODAY VALORAN IS OURS, THE VOID SHALL CONSUME ALL

{{champion:31}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:121}} *Incoherent noises*

{{champion:161}} :I need some new friends

{{champion:38}} :NOT SO FAST VOIDLINGS!

{{champion:90}} :Kassadin! But how did you escape? I made sure you were nerfed to oblivion! I HAD TO PAY SOMEONE $2.95 AN MINUTE TO MAKE SURE THE ENTIRE BALANCE TEAM SAW THE NERF THROUGH! DO YOU KNOW HOW MUCH THAT COST? I RUN A NON-PROFIT RELIGION HERE!

{{champion:38}} :THIS CAN ONLY END ONE WAY MALZAHAR! WE MUST SETTLE THIS ONCE AND FOR ALL!

{{champion:90}} :FINE! WE SHALL SETTLE THIS IS BY THE SACRED COMPETITION OF THE VOIDBORN

{{champion:38}} {{champion:90}} :A DANCE OFF!

*Malzahar begins dancing*

{{champion:38}} :Curses! How is he moving while dancing? His moves...too...much...swagger...

{{champion:90}} :HAHAHAHA

{{champion:38}} :Lights...fading...can't...breath...Evelynn...creepy...must file...restraining order


*But from the heavens a miracle arrived. Clad in Trinity Forces, the gallant hero comes to save the day*

{{item:3078}} FEAR NOT! DANCEMASTER PHREAK HAS ARRIVED!

*Phreak begins dancing*

{{champion:90}} :How can this be? Those moves! That swagger! AHHHHHH!

{{champion:161}} :HES TOO GOOD! RETREAT!

*The Voidlings and Malzahar retreat thought a {{item:3512}} , and Valoran is safe... for now*

Remember kids! Winners don't use drugs!
